inputs.prompt: A wide, cinematic establishing shot at twilight inside a vast, ruined stone courtyard. Fractured arches and collapsed columns frame the scene as cold moonlight pours through drifting fog. At the center stands a regal princess, motionless and unafraid, her silhouette perfectly balanced against the ruins. She wears an elegant, time-worn gown, the fabric heavy and textured, embroidered with faint threads of tarnished gold that catch the light. A delicate crown rests slightly askew upon her head as her hair streams in the wind. Her posture is calm and resolute, chin lifted, eyes locked forward with quiet authority. Behind her, emerging from shadow and mist, towers a colossal ancient monsterâ€”immense beyond scale, its form sculpted from cracked stone, living sinew, and darkness itself. Its glowing eyes burn softly, watchful rather than hostile, hinting at an ancient pact binding creature and crown. Moonbeams slice through the broken architecture, casting long, dramatic shadows across cracked marble floors and moss-covered ruins. Embers drift slowly through the air, mixing with rolling fog, as if the battlefield still breathes. Epic fantasy film still, dramatic wide-angle composition, strong foreground-to-background depth, volumetric moon rays, high-contrast cinematic lighting, rich atmospheric haze, ultra-detailed textures, realistic materials, painterly realism, 8K quality, emotional tension, mythic scale.
inputs.negative_prompt: lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, out of frame, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck, username, watermark, signature
